summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4552 for the improvement of Harrison Street from 5th Avenue North to Warren Avenue and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by pavng and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53253, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
